Package it.polimi.ingsw.gameLogic.model.match

Class Summary

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gameLogic.model.match.Summary
All Implemented Interfaces:
ModelObserver
public class Summary extends Object implements ModelObserver
This class implements a summary of the match situation. It contains whatever the client is able and needs to see in its view, and it's particularly useful for making easier user reconnections.

  • Constructor Details

    • Summary

      public Summary​(List<Player> playersInMatch, Map<String,​Card> cardMap, List<Cell> faithPath, Production basicProd)
      This constructor is used for Summary's initialization in a custom configuration match.
      Parameters:
      playersInMatch - the players' list
      cardMap - the already compiled cards map
      faithPath - the custom (or default eventually) faith path
      basicProd - the custom (or default eventually) basic production

    • Summary

      public Summary​(Match match, Map<String,​Card> cardMap, List<Cell> faithPath, Production basicProd)
      This constructor is called once at the beginning of the match. It initializes the Summary basing on the actual (starting) situation.
      Parameters:
      match - the match
      cardMap - the card map

    • Summary

      public Summary​(Summary toCopy)
      Copy constructor, returns a shallow copy of the Summary passed
      Parameters:
      toCopy - the summary you want to copy

    • updateMarket

      public void updateMarket​(Market market)

      Specified by:
      updateMarket in interface ModelObserver
      Parameters:
      market - the market

    • updateCardGrid

      public void updateCardGrid​(CardGrid cardGrid)
      This method, when called, updates the card grid in the summary. It inserts into every slot the id of the top card and the depth of the stack (got from cardGrid.getGrid()[i][j].size()).
      Specified by:
      updateCardGrid in interface ModelObserver
      Parameters:
      cardGrid - the card grid

      Parameters:
      lorenzoMarker - the black marker

    • updateHandLeaders

      public void updateHandLeaders​(String nickname, List<LeaderCard> handLeaders)
      This method, when called, updates the hand leaders' state of the requested player in the summary. Used for the starting choice of leaders (this will be sent ONLY to the interested player).
      Specified by:
      updateHandLeaders in interface ModelObserver
      Parameters:
      nickname - the requested player
      handLeaders - the hand leaders

    • personalizedSummary

      public Summary personalizedSummary​(String nickname)
      Returns a personalized summary based on this for the player whom nickname is passed, his hand leaders will be explicit, whereas the rival's leaders will be hidden
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player you want to personalize the summary for
      Returns:
      a personalized summary if the player passed is actually in this match, this summary unmodified if there isn't such a player in this summary
